name: Hyper Heist
description:
Cyberpunk heist speedrunning game

This game was made in 72 hours for the SpeedJam #1, with theme "Thievery"

You're playing as a HE15TBOT-1000, designed to pull off heists as quickly as possible. Your goal is to steal all the memory discs with restricted weapon blueprints.

Listen to the soundtrack: https://on.soundcloud.com/T1Kbrz7HLeFbiyta9

Controls

A/D - move

Space - jump or walljump

LMB - dash towards cursor (hold to slow down time)

Contributors

Jakub Tomšů (@jakubtomsu)  - programming, pixelart

Teodor Slavík (@fasterracer01) - programming

Miao Li(@ArchZz) - pixelart

Dylan Siebert (@nevereven_real) - music, sfx
